metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes.

o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying • Instructions: o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest. o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked.
o 1 cup semolina o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1/4 cup butter • Instructions: o Mix flour, semolina, and salt in a bowl. o Add water and knead until smooth.

• Serve immediately. Berry and Spinach Smoothie • 1/2 cup frozen berries • 1/2 cup spinach • 1/2 cup Greek yogurt • 1/2 cup almond milk • 1 tablespoon honey • In a blender, combine frozen berries, spinach, Greek yogurt, almond milk, and honey.

Beef Stroganoff • 1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced • 1 small onion, diced • 2 cloves garlic, minced • 1 cup mushrooms, sliced • 1 cup beef broth • 1 cup sour cream • 2 tablespoons flour • 2 tablespoons butter • 1 teaspoon paprika • Salt and pepper to taste • Egg noodles or rice for serving • In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. • Add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until translucent.
